name: reckless
effect: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.
short_effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
